item.title: Fun With Sensors' Data
item.description: IoT is growing rapidly. I wanted to learn more about it from an enterprise and data centric aspect of it. Here are my first of my learnings

item.title: YugabyteDB - Row Level Geo Partitioning
item.description: I have joined Yugabyte a while back. I have gone through many demos/samples. But one thing that caught my attention very early on was the geo-pinning the data. This capability can simplify compliance of data privacy laws, data sovereignty laws, etc. It can make the overall architecture of the application very simple. Here is my stab at this feature. I followed the documentation for most part.
